## Source: ossf-package-analysis (42addaed8cc5feba5482c569bddd979efaf9832b35ce8063b264b73c16ef3206)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'helm-charts-monorepo' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
